query:
SELECT
    pr.id,
    pr.repository,
    pr.number,
    pr.approved_by,
    pr.priority,
    CASE WHEN pr.build_id IS NULL
        THEN NULL
        ELSE (
            build.id,
            build.repository,
            build.branch,
            build.commit_sha,
            build.status,
            build.parent,
            build.created_at
        )
    END AS "try_build: BuildModel",
    pr.created_at as "created_at: DateTime<Utc>"
FROM pull_request as pr
    LEFT JOIN build ON pr.build_id = build.id
WHERE build.id = $1
